data.eml:eml: Culicoides parauapebensis, a new species of the subgenus Hoffmania Fox from northern Brazil (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Trindade, Rosimeire Lopes Da, Felippe-Bauer, Maria Luiza (2011): Culicoides parauapebensis, a new species of the subgenus Hoffmania Fox from northern Brazil (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 2999: 42-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201448
